body:
Spack expects the following versions:
```

    3.3.0     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-3.3.0/hadoop-3.3.0.tar.gz
    3.2.2     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-3.2.2/hadoop-3.2.2.tar.gz
    3.2.1     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-3.2.1/hadoop-3.2.1.tar.gz
    3.1.3     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-3.1.3/hadoop-3.1.3.tar.gz
    2.10.1    https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-2.10.1/hadoop-2.10.1.tar.gz
    2.10.0    https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-2.10.0/hadoop-2.10.0.tar.gz
    2.9.2     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-2.9.2/hadoop-2.9.2.tar.gz
    2.8.5     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-2.8.5/hadoop-2.8.5.tar.gz
    2.7.7     https://www.apache.org/dist/hadoop/common/hadoop-2.7.7/hadoop-2.7.7.tar.gz
```

but on the server there is only:
```
[PARENTDIR] Parent Directory                             -   
[DIR] current/                2021-06-15 15:22    -   
[DIR] current2/               2020-11-05 18:26    -   
[DIR] hadoop-2.10.1/          2020-11-05 18:26    -   
[DIR] hadoop-3.2.2/           2021-01-14 12:17    -   
[DIR] hadoop-3.3.0/           2020-11-05 18:29    -   
[DIR] hadoop-3.3.1/           2021-06-15 15:22    -   
[DIR] stable/                 2021-06-15 15:22    -   
[DIR] stable2/                2020-11-05 18:26    -   
[   ] KEYS                    2021-05-12 03:46  337K  
[TXT] readme.txt              2020-07-03 04:36  184   
```
title: Some Hadoop versions not available on server
